lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello everybody, and welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role, where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors sit around and play Dungeons & Dragons. Before we hop into tonight's episode, let's get through some announcements very quickly. First and foremost, we have our fantastic returning sponsor, our friends since the beginning of Campaign 2, D&D Beyond. Sam!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: D&D Beyond just released-- this is actually kind of exciting-- just released the new Creatures section. Users now have a place to add any type of monster stat block for easy reference during play! You can add your favorite wild shape or familiar forms, keep up with your ranger's companion, summoned creatures, mounts, ferrets-- or what do we have, a weasel?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Followers and more! You can also track hit points and customize the name and stats for all of your creatures! To celebrate, I've crafted a quick little trivia quiz for Laura! We'll start with Laura and bounce around. I searched through D&D Beyond's list of actual familiars listed on their site. I will name four creatures. One of these is actually a board game. The other three are actual D&D familiars. Which is the board game and not a familiar? A) Boggle, B) Juiblex, C) Pudding King, D) Unstable Unicorns.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Boggle!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Incorrect. I said, "Which is a board game and NOT a familiar?" Boggle is also a familiar! Unstable Unicorns is the correct answer.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's stupid!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Taliesin, one of these is a West Hollywood bar--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ready!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Three of these are D&D familiars. Which is the real bar? The Naughty Pig, the Mantrap, the Steel Predator, the Cockatrice.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Which of these is--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is a real bar!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The Naughty Pig.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Correct!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know my West Hollywood bars, man.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The other are beasts on the list. Which is the real Australian candy? (Australian accent) A nalfeshnee? Musk stick?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All of Australia is turning off.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ochre jelly? Vegepygmy?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What was the last one?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Vegepygmy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, that's not a familiar.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's B?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Musk stick. You got it correct! It's actually a candy from Australia!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Vegepygmy is a familiar?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vegepygmy is legit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to skip the next one and go straight to Travis. Sorry, Liam, you lose. No, I'll do Liam's, too! One of these is a Kama Sutra position. The other three are beasts! Which is a Kama Sutra position? The Flying Snake, the Curled Flower--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The Cold Flower?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Curled Flower. The Stench Cow, or the Corpse Flower?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Which one is the--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Kama Sutra's sexy position.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Which one is?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Run through those really fast.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Flying Snake! Curled Flower! Stench Cow! Corpse Flower!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh god, too fast.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You got it, pick one!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Corpse Flower. It's the only thing I can remember. He said it too fast!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Grung or Mojo Rawley?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Grung.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No. Manshoon or Fandango?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Manshoon!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No. Leucrotta or Lou Albano?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Lou Albano.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Correct. Annis hag or Gran Metalik?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Gran Metalik.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Correct, and one more: Giff or Mirt? They're both beasts!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't think Mirt would appreciate being called a beast.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know what any of these things are!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But a familiar, perhaps. Thank you, Sam, and thank you, D&D Beyond.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was fascinating to scroll through the list of beasts and familiars!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm especially impressed you found the list of West Hollywood bars on D&D Beyond. That's an obscure crowd.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make sure to check out this coming Monday on our Twitch channel, twitch.tv/criticalrole, at 7:00pm Pacific to see the next episode of Between the Sheets with our fantastic Sam Riegel.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm on this show?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're up the next week, yeah, get ready.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did they pay me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That would be a conversation to have with the Creative Director.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Brian has to pay me to be anywhere within 500 feet of him. It's the rule.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get to watch these two awesome gentlemen here, as well as the special guest, Stephanie Sheh.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're doing the rage room tomorrow.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Rage room!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's going to be fun.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Got almost all of it out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (slow motion talking)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Benadryl.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So there's that. Anybody else have any other announcements?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The pre-orders for the Keyfish t-shirt start shipping tomorrow. Outside of that, just go to the shop. Y'all know the drill.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's fine, we're gods!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And welcome back.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Never an accident.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Upon waking, you found that Jamedi, a hired adventurer and dungeoneer who was set out to scope the island and find this temple, this supposed structure that was built in honor of Uk'otoa long ago and had since been retaken by followers of the Cloaked Serpent. Jamedi returned, finding the rest of the path too dangerous, but had managed to locate the whereabouts of this temple. Now you've gathered your things, you left the Squalleater onto a couple of skiffs, rowed yourself onto the white beach shores of Urukaxl, and as you all step across the long beach towards the line of trees that makes the jungle, you make your way into this mysterious wooded area. Mighty Nein, welcome to the jungle.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (singing) Welcome to the jungle!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (singing) You're gonna die! (spoken) As Jamedi begins pushing forward into this, I would like to, one, have a marching order.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That fast, huh?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, you guys are going into dangerous territory.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll be up front.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yasha's first. We're all 60 feet behind her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord's up front.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll be behind him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Avantika's going to ride up with Fjord.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll be behind Jester.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jamedi's going to be scouting a little bit ahead. Nott, where are you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I guess I'll scout with Jamedi.

lines.name: TRAVIS, LIAM
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll be behind Jester, yeah, or with Jester.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yasha will hold up the rear from a defensive standpoint. Caduceus, Caleb?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll be toward the back, I guess.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will walk behind Beauregard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also, question: What is the temperature like here on this island? Are we tropical at this point?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are very much in tropical weather. It is warm, it is humid, and, even within maybe ten minutes of walking into the jungle, you can feel the sweat beginning to gather at the edges of your hair and the back of your coat.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb would then have taken his coat off and twisted it up and tied it to the back of his coat, so he's just with the holstered books and his shirt sleeves rolled up at this point since it's so hot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're leaving the coat behind?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I just tied it onto the back of my pack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ok, gotcha. Cool.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Rolled it up like a carpet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You begin to step through the soft floor of the island jungle, each footstep coming with a sort of spongy pressure before it hits hard earth, rock, or just compressed compost and soft vegetation. I need you all to roll a stealth check as a group as you press forward.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I cast Pass Without a Trace so everyone around me gets plus ten?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, might be a good idea.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She's nice in the middle for a good spread.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: May I put up my cloaky thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Of course.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm also going to--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (sneezes)

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Bless you!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: First roll with the new CR die!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Gesundheit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to politely ask the local greenery and let them know that we're going to be coming through and that we're going to try not to disturb them so long as nothing disturbs us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you cast Pass Without a Trace?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, I did!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you do that out loud?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, have to.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The local greenery?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, I mean, I got to talk to a couple of trees and let them know that we're coming through.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to give the Blessing of the Trickster to Fjord.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't need it, but okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank god for that plus ten because that was terrible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Avantika and Jamedi. Got it. All right, Caduceus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're all within the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 30-foot radius, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll roll for Yasha as well. Natural 18, all right. You guys ever so quietly disappear into the jungle brush without issue. The hanging vines and heavy palm fronds around you heavily obscuring your procession deeper into this--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Caduceus, can I ask you: what do you hear when you converse?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Shh.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (whispering) Yeah, I'm sorry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If you want to hear it, you have to listen for it. You hear that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What're you hearing, then?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nothing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Exactly, yeah. It's good. All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (whispering) They're not saying anything.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Continuing onward. Who's keeping watch on this?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Me, and--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm keeping an eye out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who am I out there with? Cosko?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jamedi.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, and Frumpkin.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, and Caduceus please.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm keeping an eye around as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Go ahead and roll perception for your vicinity. You guys are rolling perception for the path ahead of you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Three.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What the fuck? Plus?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Plus zero.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why are you rolling perception checks?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm in the front. Makes sense!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you get a haircut?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I just styled it a little bit differently.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It looks good!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, that's nice!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It might have been the loss of your Samson-like powers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Bring it in. Pushing forward, you look ahead and it's just endless trees and hanging vines and heavy roots in the ground. You feel nice and confident in the fact that nothing is catching your attention. A hand touches your shoulder and turns you to the right. It's Jamedi, who goes, "Shh. Look at this here. This was the first on my--" He pulls a small piece of paper and is taking notes. "I have not looked further within, but this was the first marker to our entry "inside." As he points over to show you, about a hundred or so feet off, partially obscured by one of the nearby heavy fronds, a dilapidated driftwood shack, with a frond-thatched roof. He looks back to the rest of you as you begin to approach. "This is the first marker. Do you have a "need to stop or do we press on?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You've been past here before?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I do not know if it is safe or not."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe we should go investigate just in case there's an early warning system or something, and there's someone in there watching us?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Caduceus, Nott, want to check it out?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Us?!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Such a good idea.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That is a really good idea.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. I'll take a big swig and go towards it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Jamedi begins to move, and Avantika puts her hand out and stops Jamedi, and goes, "Terribly sorry, but you are more important on this. You two, you can do this "without him?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes we can, Captain.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well. We await your return."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're supposed to be listening to her, or something. I don't know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A lot of it appears to be driftwood, or ramshackle planks that have been carved from trees that have fallen over in the vicinity, or possibly scavenged from shipwrecks that have washed ashore. It is a mismatch of different types of wood and cobbled materials, but it is a shack. It's probably no more than ten-foot by ten-foot, it's not extremely large. You do see a half-rotted sheet of some sort of thick material that blocks the doorway. You see some holes that have been eaten through it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Want me to go knock, or you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're harder to see, I suppose, so there's that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll come up with you, though.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to sneak up and peak through the curtain.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You get to the curtain and the material is a thick-- you can see that it probably once belonged to a sail or of a heavy tarp that's long rotted and mildewed, and as you put your hand to it and tug on it, elements of the threads separate a little bit. Peering inside, you see it's mostly empty. There's a simple cot, there's a chair, a mildewed leather coat that appears to be half folded over and thrown in the corner, and a small box up on the far end of the table in the room that's just open; there's no lid to it. The whole room smells faintly of rot.

lines.name: MARISHA, TRAVIS, LAURA
lines.text: (pigeon cooing)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Shh.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to poke up and put my head in as well. There's no trap doors? Nowhere where anybody could be hiding?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can look for traps.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can make an investigation check if you want to go check the interior.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was just curious immediately if there was anything I notice; I wasn't going to--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll look around for traps on the floor and stuff.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was going to look around. Actually, if you're doing that, I'll look around the outside to see if anybody's watching us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Make a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Investigation?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Glancing around the space, you see half of your party hiding, mostly, not too far off, maybe a hundred feet from the edge. Looking around you, you notice there are a few animals that are up in the top of the trees, leaping. Looks to be some sort of monkey-type creature, small, leaping from branch to branch. You see a few colorful jungle birds that are up in the higher elements of the tree tops. At the moment, no noticeable dangerous figures that could be lurking nearby.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nothing's really watching.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's just the table, the cot, the open box.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Then I'll use Mage Hand to reach up for that box and grab it off the shelf.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You pull the box off the shelf and pull it over. It has a bunch of old, dry-rotted navigation tools. You can see a wooden handled magnifying glass. You can see a piece that held an instrument that was used for charting paths along maps, but the wooden elements of these have warped over time and dried out and there are metallic bits are rusted a bit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does the magnifying glass look like it might still work, maybe?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It could still work. The glass hasn't been touched; the housing for it has rusted a little.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll grab that. Mr. Clay, should we go in further, or what do you think?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know. Has the bed been slept in? Does it seem like someone's been here recently or is this abandoned, do you think?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why don't you go check it out?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What? Oh! Well, I'll put my head in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll an investigation check as you inspect the bed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking at the cot, it's a simp--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 12, sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12. Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You don't see the cot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a simple cot. It looks like the material bows in the middle where somebody would've slept previously. It's stained from weather over time. Looking up at the thatched roof, it looks like there's probably been a few storms that have battered it enough to the point where it leaks through, and the place itself doesn't really keep any of the rain at bay, what manages to filter down through the treetops nearby, at least. As you push on it, the material tears a bit, and beneath it you see a smaller chest of some kind.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Huh.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does look dangerous to you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The chest?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can come see if it's trappied.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sure. I'm going to take a step back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll Mage Hand check for traps.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow, so far today, I've rolled two threes and three fours.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Buddy!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Switch that fucking dice out!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, it's going to pay off.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just think, slot machine!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The chest is locked; it does not appear to be trapped.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. I'll open it. It's not trapped, for sure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Be my guest.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, that's better. 24 total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ding ding ding ding!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Cherry, cherry, cherry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jackpot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go ahead. It opens up; nothing seems to happen. It's relatively small; it's maybe six by four inches in size. You slowly pull it open, moving the cot out of the way. Looking inside, immediately you see a small, golden statue, maybe three inches tall, that is a relatively simple carving; it's not extremely detailed. The relief looks like the head of a cobra with the hood open and the jaw open with fangs drawn. Next to that you see three approximately gold piece-sized rubies. They're that big around, but they're fairly thin.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll grab them all!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ruby buttons!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you remove the objects, the chest slides back against the wall as whatever cable is attached to it goes through a loop through the ceiling and you feel shifting as a large urn of some kind that is currently set up inside a thatch roof tips over, and begins to just release a payload on top of both of you--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe it's just a silly prank, it's water.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks to be a cluster of poisonous snakes, dozens of them just stumble down from above. What do you guys do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do we do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Leap out of the way!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, yeah, I guess I will try to not get hit by the cluster of snakes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make a dexterity check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You got any of that rogue shit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Save?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (hissing) Save friends!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 23 to save.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You duck out of the way to the back, get your crossbow ready, and look down. The snakes hit the ground with a sludgy slap. All of these snakes have long been dead, mostly decomposed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They didn't feed the trap snakes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Apparently whoever was been handling this hut hasn't been here for a while.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Aw, that's sad.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, that's just sad, that's, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you want them to decompose?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, that'd be nice, wouldn't it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I'll see if I can start the muck going in here and maybe get a nice little indoor terrarium, I don't know what will happen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, they're still mostly decomposed. But the weather, at least the way it was kept up in there, wasn't conducive to any heavy jungle fungus, it seems. But you harry that along. You, through your cantrip, manage to watch as these dull blue and gray spores begin to apparate in a row across the pile of somewhat sludgy snake remains.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's already better.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Were they real rubies or was it all a ruse to get me to pull on them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They appear to be.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I have them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have them. You have everything that's in the chest, you have the gold idol, the small snake head idol, and you have these three gold piece-shaped rubies. They're about that thick, and that big around. Make an investigation check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. It would be perception, actually.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look at the rubies as you're inspecting them and they have little scratches at the edges, it's like slight-- I wouldn't say imperfections, it's not like they were originally there. But you can see small grooves or lines along the outer edge where something metal or pointy was used to scrape or picked.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is good. This is some Uncharted shit right now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There are some maps in with the compass-- just some tools? All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nothing else. Just a few things left behind, and no sign of who once built or at least lived in this space nearby. But they haven't been here for a while, whoever they were.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go tell the others about everything that we found, except for all the rubies and gold. I'm kidding, we'll tell them about it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, I-- you know, okay, sure. We can do that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Unless you're cool with not telling them, because that's cool with me, too.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Telling who what?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, you're confusing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What did you find, what did you find?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can't-- I found two rubies.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Two whole rubies?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa, what did they look like?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Like this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It'd look even better with the golden snake thing. I mean the whole thing comes together nicely.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What golden snake?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, there's a golden snake, I forgot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it just a cobra head by itself, or is there also a body?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's just a head, about an inch below where the jaw opens. It's about three inches tall altogether.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it like our little mini Yasha bust?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kind of, yeah! Only with no torso. It's just like a snake head that's curled up, and it's only from about there to where the mouth is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I try to feed the ruby to the snake head.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: May I have a look at this one? Not the rubies.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I see anything cool about the rubies? Do I also see the little (scratching)?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do also notice the small scrapes, yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are there any runes on this thing, does it seem arcane in nature?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does not appear to have any runes inscripted on it. There's no language carved or pressed into the mold. It looks to be like it was sculpted not by a master artist or sculptor. Some of the details are a little loose and bleed a bit: where the mouth and the teeth are some of them are a little bent or off-kilter. It looks like it was more of a passion project than a fine piece of craftsmanship.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, how does everyone feel about a ten-minute breather here? I sit down and unholster my book and begin to cast Identify as a ritual.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey, can you do that on multiple things at a time?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No. One at a time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That seems excessive.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do you have that you want to identify?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you have a quicker way?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just a thing that was given to me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What thing was given to you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A feather from Nila, forever ago.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's only ten minutes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You don't trust her?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who's Nila?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know, I'm just saying it might be magical.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Magic feather.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Magic feather. Maybe it makes me fly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maybe it makes you fly, maybe it makes you molt. There's all sorts of things feathers could do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh that's right, you didn't meet Nila.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nuh-uh.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, she looked like Caduceus.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She was really nice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We didn't look anything alike, but yeah she was very nice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh sorry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm much taller.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we can take ten minutes, we'll set out a little perimeter just to make sure we deflect any unwanted--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean if Avantika thinks it's okay. Does Captain Avantika think it's okay for us to take ten minutes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Captain Avantika crosses her arms and impatiently goes "Whatever it takes if you think "it will give us there safer. I trust you and your specialties."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey is there any benefit to showing-- I whisper-- is there any benefit to showing Captain Avantika that letter we found that she wrote?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hmm, we should ask Fjord before we do that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (yelling) Hey Fjord!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Huh?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there any benefit to showing Captain Avantika the letter that I think she wrote?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why would we do that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know. That's why I'm asking. I'm a simple goblin. I don't know the world weary ways of a sailor.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You certainly could. I don't see what harm it could bring.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm still picturing you in the stripy sailor outfit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure, go for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I'll just hang on to it. If she ever is like, I don't know. If we ever need it, we got it!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I walk over. Hey, are we whispering?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shh. We're whispering.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh sorry. Sorry, we're whispering.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Never mind, we were just talking about this letter, but don't show Avantika. We can use it to copy her handwriting and write a check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You never show people their stolen mail.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, of course, I should have asked you first!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't. Absolutely not. Keep that shit on lock.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's rolling dice, you guys. Is the shack large enough to house our entire?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not comfortably, by any means.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll kind of--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll be quiet, we'll just stay still and look around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In this ten minutes, the blanketed heat and humidity this jungle tends to hold in is uncomfortable for those of you more used to the northern elements of this continent.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, this sucks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It seems to be just an idol, it looks like it was attached to something in the past, but it's probably literally worth its weight in gold.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nott, here's your toy back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have a question for you, Matt. Is it really just us and Avantika and Jamedi?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And that's it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I scan the forest. Are we being followed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck, balls, shit, six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looks clear.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So foggy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, that's the humidity. I walk over to Avantika and say: Might I ask, you said your men are dedicated to this cause as well. How much do you share with them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I share what is needed. I share with them the elements of the dreams and visions I've been "given. For me it is one thing to have a loyal crew; it is another to have a crew that has faith "in you beyond being just captain. I do not want a mutiny, and what's more effective than someone "that thinks that not only are you a proper captain, but you are the link to their god?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Very effective.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There are ranging levels of belief, maybe, but I think with the time we spend together and "the willingness to understand the possibilities of having a captain with such capabilities at their "disposal, that-- well, riches are not that far off on the horizon, eh?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Blind belief is quite remarkable. I'm assuming you've shown them things to garner some level of expectation of your abilities?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, do not misunderstand, I myself have gutted and cut down dozens of men who have "attempted to take my position."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't doubt it for a moment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a very forceful intent to make sure everything is properly placed and well taken care of on her person. She looks about and goes, "And as much as we are keeping an eye on us ahead, I am "still keeping and eye on all of you, of course."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would expect nothing less.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Because, while I would like to believe this new-found kinship could make for some very "incredible possibilities in the future, you cross me and this blade will find your heart faster than "anything you've seen move."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's hope it doesn't come to that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I hope not either." She reaches out and pokes your nose and turns around.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She booped you. Nope.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She just gets a finger full of sweat.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Was all of that for all to hear or are they off a bit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They were off a bit, away from everybody.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are we satisfied?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go, let's keep going. Oh, what?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I'm good. Break time over.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. Jamedi?" "Of course." They begin falling into the same positions, with both Jamedi and Nott taking point. Everybody make another stealth check, please.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Another stealth check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pass Without a Trace still going? It goes for how long?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It lasts for an hour.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So yeah, it's still going for a bit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, Blessing, who needs a Blessing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (pigeon cooing)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically it's still on Fjord.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21? Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All doing pretty damn well. Continuing to coast forward for the next hour, hour and a half or so, following Jamedi's path. You can see him pulling out notes here and there and looking for different things, and occasionally he'll come upon a heavy palm tree or jungle tree that he's marked with a blade and he's keeping tabs on his marks to follow his path back to where he originally found his way. Along the way, the insects are getting really obnoxious. The buzzing itself becoming this low, droning, ever-present hum, but the bites are getting extremely obnoxious. Jamedi acknowledging, once he starts seeing it more and more, goes, "I did not find "them a problem before. Perhaps they seem to enjoy your flavors more than mine."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ew.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm really tasty

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And sweet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are the insects really not bothering him at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're not bothering him really, it seems.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just out of idle curiosity--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is he a human?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's human.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to very quickly cast Eyes of the Grave.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Of the what?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Anything undead within 60 feet is going to glow and I'm going to get a little glow off anything that registers as undead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What the fuck?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Beauregard starts glowing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Twist!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (gasping)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You slick motherfucker.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Still a twist!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Really? Out of the fucking blue.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you share this knowledge with anyone?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: At some point when I can get to Fjord quietly, at some point.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Well, first off, I need everyone to make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why? Because it's so hot?

lines.name: MATT, TRAVIS
lines.text: Just make one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jeez, that was so close.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: TRAVIS, LAURA
lines.text: Nein!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is that back?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Natural 12.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Continuing to press on.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Somebody cast something, right? Does that mean somebody cast something?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, it's Jamedi.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it just so hot? What's happening? Is it bugs?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to crawl up to Fjord in the line at some point. Been keeping my eye out, getting the lay of the land and Jamedi is not quite alive.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm sorry, did you say not quite--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not quite alive.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Am I close enough to where I can overhear this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't think it's an appropriate moment to bring something like that up, but it's worth--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you detect anything sinister?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, it's not quite alive.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, that's inherent, sure. Right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If anything, I feel like I'm exercising an enormous amount of willpower just not to-- I mean, just doesn't seem like we're in-- there's a good advantage to dealing with this now. But, yeah, there's something weird there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you for letting me know. I hope you'll keep an eye on it for us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, I'm keeping an eye on it. Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would also say, as we're tromping through, that I would push forward and try to catch up with Jamedi, momentarily. Oh jeez, what is that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Excuse me, two questions for you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looks over his shoulder at you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's that? How much further? A day's travel or more than one day until we reach our destination?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "With a full group like this, and trying to be as quiet as possible. I give us about maybe one "day. There will be a night of camping along the way."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And did you encounter any kind of threats?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This many? Well, not as much."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Anything specific that we should be on guard for or prepared for?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There are lizardfolk that exist on the outskirts of this island."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You mentioned that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They call the rivers, streams and the inlets home. Then there are the people of scale "and fang, the snake-folk that exist further in near this temple. Variations of their strange "physical--" What are you guys doing over there?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Trying to open candy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How about we hold off? Congratulations.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was sort of my fault. I apologize.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The people that have built around this temple, their variations in how their worship-- "the boons of this long-gone snake god they worship seems to apparate on their person in different "ways. I've seen some with heads that are full of serpent features, patches of scales, yellow eyes, "as well as some with limbs themselves transformed into snake-like forms. It is stuff of nightmares."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like their arms but their legs are just--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You avoided them, you did not tangle with them yourself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, that is not the work I do. I am not a fighter by any means. My job is to not be seen, to "infiltrate, recover, and expedite my exit."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going back to my earlier position.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Continuing forward for the next few hours or so, the heat is getting heavier and heavier as the afternoon sky now greets you. You find yourself stopping to eat and drink water along the way with what supplies you have available to you. The next few hours or so as it begins to get darker and darker--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have a question.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: With my medicine stuff, would I know anything that would help get rid of bugs and stuff? That would keep bugs away from me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's possible. Make a nature check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, a natural one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have no clue.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Bugs! How do they work?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not a whole lot of jungle insects in or around Nicodranas, unfortunately. Nothing catches your attention necessarily.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You said it's also darker now? As I chew on some liquorice root.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, it's getting steadily darker as you guys move your way through.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Were there any flowers on our journey?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Were there any what?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Flowers. Did we pass any flowers?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are a number of jungle flowers that you pass.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to pick some as we go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, all right. Most of the ones you come across are like a dull pink in color that fade to a green at the base. It's not a vibrant pink, just enough of that whitish red crossover to appear. A lot of them grow along the base of the roots of some of these jungle trees and you collect a few handfuls of them. Okay. Yes?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go over to Fjord while we're taking a break. Hey, did you find anything out from Avantika? About, you know, shit that you guys have in common?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She's trying to build a following, like a zealot almost. You know, build believers out of her crew.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does she believe it, though?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. She's convincing if she's a liar. I think she genuinely wants to summon forth this thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But does she believe that she's a zealot, like connected to some god.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That she's the chosen? Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How are you feeling from last night? Seemed like you had a rough night.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jazzed. Excited to continue on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right. Did you ever read any horror stories as a kid or did you and your friends tell horror stories? Spooky things?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ghost stories? Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know how there's always a time where the narrator stops, lets your imagination run wild with what happens?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sometimes the less you say, the more people's minds like to fill in the blanks. From what I've learned, generally, what's in people's heads is worse than the reality of the situation.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow. Do you want to tell me what's in people's heads?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, look, we've seen you do some weird, fucked up shit, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Admittedly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So any time you're unsure it's going to make other people even more unsure, with a layer of suspicion. It's like a tiramisu of confusion.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, I admit that I'm not sure about a lot of this. No pressure, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No pressure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I will try to fill in as many details as I can.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's go fight some snake people.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Totes.

lines.name: MARISHA, TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: While that is going on, I walk over and stand next to Caduceus and say: Hey. Hello, would you hang out with me for a moment?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Excellent, let's stand right here. I casually pull out the wire and I cast Message to Nott. Nott, would you please go, I need you to speak to Avantika and Jamedi together for a moment, please?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You need me to speak to Avantika and Jamedi?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What are you saying?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sorry, what?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you talking to yourself?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. (whispering) I'm on the phone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Recast. What do you need me to say? You can respond to this message.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just distract them, please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What did he say?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Got it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is it? What did he say?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispering) I'm on the phone right now, okay? I'll get to you when I'm done.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (normal volume) Okay. That was Caleb. He wants me to go distract Avantika and Jumanji for a moment. Do you want to come help me?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What should we do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we do a dance?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We've practiced one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, we did a really good one before. So yeah. We could do that for them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could try to teach it to them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Great. Ahem. Hoy hoy! Hi, Captain Avantika.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And Jamedi.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jamedi's a few feet ahead. He's currently leading the path. They're about 20 feet from each other.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll get Jamedi.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, Jamedi!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jamedi is like, "What?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you come here for a second? I have something I need to show you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What is this? This has no bearing on--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's really important, though. It's super important.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh! 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He goes, (sigh) "What is it?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Come here, come here!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hi!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can see the temperature rising.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sigh) He begins to walk over in your direction.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, now that we have you two together.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Avantika' still ten feet from you, but is like, "What is it you want?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, we'll do this very quietly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Something that-- Hi, it's me, Gilligan. Nice to see you again. Something that we used to do on our ship to relieve the tension.

lines.name: LAURA, SAM
lines.text: And raise morale.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Was we had a boat dance.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, and it was specific when we were on really important missions and stuff.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you guys have one of those?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not specific to the dance, no. Not to the boat, at the very least."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, so you have dances, though? Did you do to raise morale? Do you and Jamedi do one together?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jamedi goes, "This is completely inconsequential to me and I need to keep an eye on "the path ahead."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: After a moment passes, I stand behind Caduceus' tall frame and quietly cast Detect Magic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So, you cast Detect Magic. As your visual aura expands beyond, giving you faint bits of essence of magic around you. All of your friends that have various magical accoutrements themselves, begin to glow on their persons and around their persons. You can see that Avantika, both blades that are currently sheathed give off a faint aura. That seems to be all that you can notice at the moment.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Even for Jamedi?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jamedi, you do not see--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, I need to walk up and learn more about this dance, then.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wait, I'm going to stop you because I see what you're doing. You're probably not going to get anything off him, but he's got an undead vibe that I've been picking up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh. Ja verstehen, okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's hot, but--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I still want to see what he's carrying.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're really going-- Let me know what you see and we'll compare notes later.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What are you two doing over here? You're holding up. We need to move.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jamedi's already moving, by the way, he's ignored both of you and has continued up with the path.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I try to catch up to him!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. We're just showing the dance, is all.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, sorry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I pass them by. Try to catch up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you catch up, the next thing you see as you turn back is Jamedi, hand up behind in your direction.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shh!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's a ninja.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you all begin to listen, Beauregard, Caleb, and Caduceus, you hear the cracking of branches and twigs and the shifting of jungle floor. Jamedi puts two fingers in the air and then--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What does that mean? What does two mean?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Two people go up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I creep up to just about 30 feet away.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't! Not you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I agree. And I walk up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so Beauregard and Caleb approach.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, why are you following me? Why are you doing this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see long snouts with rows of sharp teeth and a frill down the back of the neck. You can see makeshift bits of leather strapped together to form patches of armor across the torso. Big heavy shields, carved from some sort of a large shell, that has multiple rows of spines and hooks down the back of it. You see clubs and heavy blades that are made of makeshift, scavenged metal or weapons that have washed up on shore or have been recovered from others that have been unlucky to make their way to this island and never returned.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How many?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Four of them. Each one of them has a spear.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I duck down, I turn to the rest of the group, and I say: (whispering) Snake. Four of them. Shields. Weapons.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a bad gesture.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I quickly turn around and through the wire say: (whispering) There's four lizard people over here. Looking in the distance at them and at Jamedi.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, make a perception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Before this spell fades.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispering) There's four lizard people up there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) Oh.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We should do this quietly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I direct the group and I say: You flank this way, and then you guys flank that way. We flank around.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just for fun, but let's try it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yasha's cupping behind her ear going, "What?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yasha and Fjord to the right. We'll go to the left.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (growling and impacts) Glancing over, Caleb, you watch as behind them on the bushes in the opposite side of this small path they are walking through, you see three arrows. Two of these lizardfolk tumble to the ground to one knee (growling). They turn around and two people in purple-ish robes with basic jewelry and leather bands rush forward with daggers and a scimitar in the other hand and slash out and start hacking. These lizards are now being assaulted by these people and behind them, one burly man with weathered, dark skin, exposed chest, and these large, billowing, thick arms that look like two very long, five-foot serpents that come protruding out the sides of the shoulders into these two separate snakeheads, full with eyes and teeth, rush forward and slam, biting into the throat of one of the lizardmen. He goes (choking) and gets pulled to the ground.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Arm snakes? His arm snakes?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They have completely gone into this combat between the two of them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Roughly how far away is that fray?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's about 60 or 70 feet. They haven't noticed any of you here and you are currently completely in shadows. What do you do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (whispering) I tell them to hold.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also, do I see anything glowing on Jamedi?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you see anything glowing on any of the snake people, though?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Too far away.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We duck.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're staying put.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And watching. So it's snakes versus lizards, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is the ultimate Godzilla movie.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: His big arms are five feet? Like, these big-ass--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. About a foot wide and they spiral upward and then they snap into giant fangs that protrude and snap on each. His face is intense and grinning. This is a hunting party. One of the lizardmen grabs his spear and jams it into the abdomen of the man with the snake arms. Looks back and hisses at him angrily. Manages to pull the spear free with one of the snake hands, leaps over, pole vaulting off the ground, the other snakehead coming out and snapping into the shoulder and chest area of the snakeman and then throwing him up into the air. You hear (screech) as he goes flying, spinning up into the boughs, lands on the ground. He stands back up, grabs his shield, and you can see him woozy. There's this black color where the impact of the wound was, and you see the veins growing dark. It stumbles and falls onto its knees and then falls to the ground.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Some people got venomous bites.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You ever seen an anaconda mouth? There are lots of teeth in there. It's real bad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One by one, you watch as each of the lizardmen are felled from the ambush and--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Three of the other party.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. Two of which looked to be comparably smaller creatures, but they just weren't prepared and while the three snakeman hunting party appeared to have sustained a few blows and injuries, they were successful.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The other two only had eyes that seemed off?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. As you're inspecting, you can see patches of skin across their shoulders and a part of the chest, you can see scales that appear and then vanish. With the battle done, the quiet hits, and they begin to walk off to a small patch where they had dropped some sort of a satchel. They start pulling out rope and they start tying the legs together of these lizardmen until they have two of them tied on one side and the other two tied ankle-to-ankle on the other. The one with the two snake arms picks up both and begins dragging them behind him in the jungle while the other two flank and look out into the grass below. They begin making their way deeper towards the path where they came, away from you. Their hunt successful, they're bringing their meal back with them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The path that they took away, does it line up or deviate from the general direction that we have been heading in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The direction you've been traveling has been a little zig-zaggy, because it's been following Jamedi's path and the marking he's making, so you're not entirely certain. It seems it could be parallel to the path you're going, but since you don't know the final destination, you're not entirely certain if it'll line up with it or not.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) Jamedi!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: His hand's still up, he's just watching carefully. (whispering) "Shh! What?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are we following them or are we going a different way?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We are not to get anywhere near these creatures."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good. They eat lizard people.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So I have noticed."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you see his arms?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I did. It was quite frightening."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god. Imagine if it was his legs. How would he even walk?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It is a very good question. One that will keep me up late at night."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not sure if he's joking. Do you guys do anything else or you just let them pass and continue on?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're going to let them go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did they leave anything on the ground? Did they leave anything? Did they drop anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The canopy of trees above, right? There's no sort of--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's a thick jungle canopy. It breaks in places.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That was the greatest plan we've ever had. We flanked. The battle was just over!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We didn't punch our way through shit!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a new day.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Amongst the ground where the battle took place, you can see there are mashed plants and streaks of thick lizardmen blood, a few broken teeth that are scattered in the sand there, but nothing beyond that of value.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I take some teeth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you get three lizardmen teeth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I turn around and I say: Do we have anything that resists poison or venom?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have a spell that I took this morning that will cure poison, but I don't have anything that protects from poison today.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Caduceus, you raised your hand.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got both, but it's best applied when needed, really. There's only so much to go around.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I feel like maybe with these people we should have a frontline party and a backline party. And maybe a little frontline poison resistance could be good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So put our two clerics in front?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No! I don't mind going in front, mainly because I have no fucking range.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we have to keep whispering? Can we pretend we're still whispering, but let's not actually whisper?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can we do that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's up to you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But if we give the, "We're stage whispering!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (normal volume) This is my whisper voice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just saying, these guys clearly have reach and I don't think we want to have all of us tangle with them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who do you think should be in front?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, you make a good point.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if we're in the middle because we're so heal-y?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's fair. We'll be in the middle just in case things go wrong.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're so heal-y, yeah!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm pretty heal-y.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm not going to volunteer to speak for anybody, but I know I'm better when I'm up in close.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll join you. Anybody else? Everybody else should stay at least 20, 25 feet back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Could you give the both of us resistance?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If we get into an altercation, I'll pop both of you as quickly as possible.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should have somebody keeping an eye behind. Did you notice the snake people came up behind the lizard people?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yasha should stay with the healers for sure.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yasha can look behind. (whispering) Yasha! Behind!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I-- I have been."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The whole time! You, me, Jamedi, and Avantika in the front.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Avantika's in the front? With you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is that all right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have been spending this entire debate looking north and remembering everything that I saw on the way here from the boat and just calculating an exit strategy, because I remember the things that I saw on the way here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There is a ruin in front that might give us some cover." Continuing on?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Jamedi, what if it was his dick that was the snake though?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He keeps his eyes trained forward but goes, "I imagine it would be difficult to relieve oneself."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Probably.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (shouting) Or masturbate!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He turns around and goes, "Shh! It is a valid point, but I need you to be quiet, please."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Good riddance.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: While the insect bites have subsided, this sound itself is uncomfortable. For those of you who are used to more comfortable sleep, you begin to dread the possibility of finding a night's rest in this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Caleb, if you do the bubble thing, can the insects come in the bubble? Can you make it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, Jester, doesn't it glow?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I'm able to affect its color and have it match. It still looks like a very smooth bubble that is 8-feet tall-- maybe not that big, but it can match the general color.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just be dark and not attract any other attention?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, it does not glow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, then do it please!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah-- this is great.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I spend the next 11 minutes, I pull out the book, unholster it and start doing a ritual cast, ja?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ritual cast of?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Leomund's tiny hut. Is this where we want to do it, Jester?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is where we're camping though, yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jamedi says, "Perhaps we wait until we get to the ruin, just so we have some cover beyond the trees."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, just a little longer then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who's keeping watch on this first bit of a night travel?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll take one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Roll perception, as will Jamedi.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21? Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll pop in the occasional low-level Light cantrip as far away from us as possible, just popping every now and then, if I think I see something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Following this little chain of lights that pop and glow as it goes, eventually you come upon the first signs of stone rubble. Some sort of structure was built here long ago, and has since fallen over, and elements of its masonry either moved or reclaimed for other structures elsewhere on the island, but you can see the basis of walls and joining positions where elements of this previous building were used to maintain and hold the ceiling that has since fallen in. There is a series of walked paths that carved through the various ferns and heavy bush, but you do find the back of one of these walls where Jamedi says, "This is where I slept previously. Perhaps this is "the best place to rest. So--" He begins to set up a small tent arranging against the wall. What do you guys do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do we want it just to be us and they have the tent?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Kind of. I mean, is that rude?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They didn't bring any tents for us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But remember that you can hear through the bubble, remember still, though. Okay. So we can't talk bad about them, though.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think maybe we invite them in and one of us keeps out--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But do it like, "Do you want to stay with us?" but do it like this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you want to ask them with that stink face?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Captain Avantika and Jamedi, did you want to stay with us in the bubble?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's no facilities or anything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's stinky in there, but if you want to.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jamedi goes, "I am unfamiliar with what this bubble is you speak of?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's whatever. It's a little bubble.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's like a tent.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's like a tent, basically.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I am okay." He heads back to configuring his tent. Avantika tilts her head and goes, "I "assume this is some sort of protective measure for your night's rest?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then I would be delighted to join you."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, don't feel like you're obligated--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Believe me, it is my honor."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Great, cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sheathes the rapier, but keeps the dagger drawn, turned around in her hand so it's face down and looks over her shoulder both ways out towards the darkness. "So how spacious is this?" As you finish the spell, the strange, colored orb appears there on the side of the ruins.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: At the surroundings here or what, we're behind a little bit of stone ruins, or--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, there's a couple of small stone elements there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have control of the color. Also out of curiosity, I am a transmutation wizard, so do I have a sense of how old the stone surrounding us is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The stone here-- make an intelligence check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ugh, bad roll. 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's quite old. It might be older than this age, might have existed pre-Calamity, or at least somewhere in that neighborhood. But you're not entirely certain.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mr. Caleb, want to take a walk, maybe? Really quickly around this thing, get a gander at it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The thing is, if I exit this bubble now, then it goes away.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, then I'll just report back in a minute.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I could do it again--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll let you know when I see.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want company? Do you need anyone with you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, I'd love company, actually, just in case.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Beau! Nott! (whispering) Keep an eye on them, okay? Let me know what happens.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: On who?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shut up! I mean--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: On who, our friends?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, just-- forget it, let's go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll take a look around this thing, and I also want to cast another Detect Undead, while we're walking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're going to look around what?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take a walk around this little ruin. I'm going to have the little Light spell up, see if there's any writing on anything, any carvings. I'm going to have Eyes of the Grave up again. I'm going to be looking for any undead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. And you're accompanying him?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm watching his back!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The rest of you are staying within the sphere, gray color, dimly lit on the interior? It can be whatever light source you want at this point. The two of you wander around the ruin. Make an investigation check, if you don't mind.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I help? Does that make it easier?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You roll too, maybe.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Nope.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: One! I'm not very observant today, okay? I've got things on my mind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you walk through and pore over the ruins, the structure is fairly simple. This wasn't some beautifully-made stone hall. Most of the stones here were probably pulled from rivers or were smoothed over, and they're varying sizes, and the masonry is very simple.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Couldn't figure what it's a temple to, or any--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not particularly. You don't know if it's a temple; it could have been an abode. It doesn't appear to be huge. There seem to be one or two adjacent rooms that were set in that space.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And nothing from the Detect Undead?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nothing from the Detect Undead, no.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Other than what I already expect to see?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What I expect to see is still giving off a little glow, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. What's the range on that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 60 feet, although I will say divination magic would also blind me to that, and if it was full cover, I would possibly not see it as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, understood. Caduceus, what's your armor class?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're looking over the stonework and turning to Jester to mention you didn't see much--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The funny thing is--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (impact) There is a shape that moves out of the shadows with incredible speed. The light, the faint color being emanated from Caduceus' cantrip immediately falls away and you see the streak of his hair disappear in the nearby shadow. I need you to make a strength saving throw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like he's gone? He's just gone in front of me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watched him be pushed off into a nearby bush.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Football tackled, just gone, okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a fail. You get pushed off, land on the ground, you tumble, and are held prone on the ground as what little bit of light you can see-- not having darkvision, unfortunately-- what you see is a faint glimmer of two large white fangs, a smattering of whiskers right before you, this growl sound, and a cluster of snake heads that bend around each side of the head.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I just peed a little.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The bite attack hits you. That is only five points of piercing damage. Actually, it gets advantage on the second one. Okay, with the advantage it does hit, and the other one, the snakes all snap onto you, multiple snake bites, all biting across your face and your throat. For that, you suffer eight points of piercing damage and you need to make a constitution saving throw, please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Mr. Clay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, come on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ooh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, don't make that sound, Matthew.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I need to make a constitution saving throw?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You've got this, Mr. Clay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come on, snitch!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a success. You take half damage. You only take 12 points of poison damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh my god!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But he's not poisoned?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. Jester, you see the shape and you glance over and you can see with your darkvision this ten-foot-long leopard-like cat that is currently now pressed onto the chest and body of Caduceus. It bites down towards him and all these strange protrusions from around the shoulders and head area all strike down, as a few of them curl back and look at you and in that bit, you can see a few beats of light, faint bits of starlight and moon that are coming down and reflecting in the eyes of these snake heads. And you hear this (growling) up behind you on the ruin where you were just standing. I'll be right back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We got ambushed!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do we do?!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Clever girl.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How far away are you guys?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know if we're very far. I don't think we're very far away.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They went to do a perimeter sweep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Find out about these beasts on D&D Beyond!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shit! That means there's probably more than two?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Look at these palm trees!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is really cool, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caduceus, you are over here. Jester, you are here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now the rest of you are over-- so Jamedi's over here in his tent. The rest of you are all clustered inside the hut. Caduceus--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god, it's so scary! It's a leopard with snake heads!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a leopard with snakes!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why would you make that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's someone who was drunk at night and was like, "Let's just do this thing!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically you guys don't hear anything, so we'll see when it comes around your turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, what? What do you mean, we don't hear anything? You said we heard through the bubble!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear sounds, but there's been no sound yet. You guys have been setting yourselves up for the evening there. The only person that would have probably noticed would have been Caduceus.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And he is getting fucked up right now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The good news is we're totally safe in this bubble and nothing can happen to us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And both of our clerics--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Both our healers are outside! Typical.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wow. Cool.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nobody.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, someone roll for Yasha.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to get that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Seven, plus-- I got to get her sheet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think it's nine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I need a Turkish delight before I die.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25 to 20. Nobody? 20 to 15?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Beau, Caduceus.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No! Stop! Look at all the powder falling off.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're going to eat that whole box.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 to ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Ten to five.

lines.name: TRAVIS
