lines.text: Yasha has nine. I have eight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nott's sitting at seven. Oh, I'm at eight, actually. Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord and Nott got the same. All right, Caleb.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vier.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Four.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Eins, zwei, drei, vier.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau, you're up first, but you have not noticed anything, so your turn is spent fluffing your space to sleep for the evening.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know what, Fjord? I think Jester is a little jealous. Just throwing it out there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jealous? Jealous of what?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shit, are you fucking serious right now?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Six seconds. Done.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caduceus.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to yell for help and then I'm going to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You all immediately hear--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Help! Then I'm going to tap my staff to wake up my beetles as my bonus action. My beetles are going to make a bite attack on that. I actually have that information now thanks to the update.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: On D&D Beyond?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: On D&D Beyond.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So that's a swarm attack, they have a bite. That's plus three to hit, I believe. That's a 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13 does not hit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. That's okay. Well, they're in the space right now. I'm panicking, so this is going to be fun. I'm going to start making a weird, awful sound, and I'm going to start getting even paler and a little gaunter, and I'm going to grab it and I'm going to cast-- I'm so panicked-- Vampiric Touch.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I like it! Get some of that shit back.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So since I'm in contact with it--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a melee spell attack.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Melee spell attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll for an attack.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What is a melee attack here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a d20 plus your spell attack modifier.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, plus eight. 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20 hits. Go ahead and roll damage for the Vampiric Touch.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh man, this is mean.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're next and then Jester, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 3d6. That's (counting) ten points of necrotic damage and I regain five hit points.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Atta boy!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you reach up, your hand grasps its throat and this strange hissing sound happens as you pull life force energy out of it. It's strange threads of purplish-black energy that pull into your body, your wounds healing up slightly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So I can see that, huh?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see a faint bit of energy coming out of Caduceus.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Help!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is that your turn?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That is, unless I can try and move away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're prone, so it's half movement to try and crawl away. Or you can spend half your movement to get up and then you still have half your movement to try and escape if you want.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to try and half my movement to get up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. So you get up from prone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, that's good. I thought he was like on top of you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to back up against you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Won't he get an attack of opportunity?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Will he get an attack of opportunity?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can go right there and not get an attack of opportunity.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, perfect. That way if you get poisoned, I can un-poison you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If you get poisoned, I can un-poison you!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That finishes Caduceus' turn. It's now their turn. The one up top who's hissing down at you, (long exhale). As its jaw opens, this semi-translucent rolling cloud of dust and gas emanates in a 30-foot-cone.

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: (intone "Semi-Charmed Life")

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Both clerics. Why did both clerics go on a hunting mission?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're the stupidest.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, we're so dumb.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need you both to make constitution saving throws, please.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, okay, okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Picking your dice.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's like Avatar in the fucking--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20. You manage to resist the effect.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester, you inhale it, suddenly caught off-guard by it and your eyes blink and go dark as you fall unconscious.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So sleepy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's unconscious?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, like unconscious or asleep?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like unconscious. Not zero hit points, but asleep unconscious.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like hardcore.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Bite, this one's claws, so it's going to be with advantage. Okay, that is going to make it an 18 to hit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why is it advantage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because they're flanking you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, goddamn it. Yeah, that hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so the bite attack. You take six points of piercing damage and the snakes snap at you. That is going to be a 19.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That also hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take another-- ooh, that's ten points of piercing damage. At this point, as you're between the two of them, the one behind you that just put Jester to sleep, all its snakes snap around you, the back of your head and your neck and your shoulders, and you feel the poison through your veins. Roll another constitution saving throw, please.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two of the clerics went out on a solo mission.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12? 12 just-- no, 12 succeeds!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How do you have that spray and the snakes in the same-- that's just so much.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How many hit points do you--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Help! I'm standing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Half that is going to be 13 points of poison damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm kind of still standing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's like slumped.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, they're done. Jester, you are unconscious and sleeping.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to dream about the Traveler.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That brings us to Avantika and Jamedi.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm dreaming that me and the Traveler are skipping over hills and picking flowers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What the shit is that?" pulls out the rapier and the dagger, and darts, leaping over (counting), just seeing these creatures rushes forward. "Hiyah!" and is leaping forward with her rapier and blade and is going to make three attacks. The gray is going to be with the dagger, one rapier shot misses, then one for the rapier and one for the dagger hits. For the dagger, that is--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Going for a nighttime stroll.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We are in a total danger zone, and we're taking strolls.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (singing) Danger zone!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was my own fault. I was suspicious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And another ten points of damage on that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What? On both? Wow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was a seven and a ten. Then Avantika seems to be holding both blades ready, preparing to defend herself. Jamedi, who stumbles out of his tent, is only half movement, glances over and can barely see what's there. He's on the inside of the dome, pulls out his shortbow, and is going to attempt to shoot it with an arrow and misses with a four. A natural four. There is no light source here; it seems to disappear in the distance. That finishes with his turn. That brings us to Yasha.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, Yasha will use her full movement to follow Avantika out of the bubble. The Bublé.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can she flank it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She can get to about there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is that within melee?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is within melee, yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Great. She'll take a swipe. That is a 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17 will hit!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So that's 2d6 right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 2d6 plus an additional d6.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did she rage?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, she didn't. Because I-- yep.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He doesn't know barbarians.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So no, it's just 2d6 because you weren't raging.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Great, six points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You added the three points for strength, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No! Nine points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine point of damage. You got it. Second attack?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's real fun playing a character when you don't have their sheet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. That's 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16? That hits. Go ahead and roll damage. 2d6 plus three. Plus four technically because--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, plus four? So six, so ten. Ten points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Got it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And with her bonus action, she would like to rage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord and Nott, you guys up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I heard Mr. Clay. Let's go. I'll scramble out, going into the direction that I heard the sound and seeing all these folks over here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you leave the thing, you can see everyone right there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I see the beast?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do. You see that one beast right there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will kneel down and pew, shoot it in its hindquarters. That's a miss. 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12 does not hit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Reload. Fire again. Wait, do I want to do this? Nope. I'll keep moving and hide behind that wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bonus action hide.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Role a stealth check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, that's a 28.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't you get advantage because of your cloak?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You could get a 20.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Still 28.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are stealthed there. Okay, so that finishes Nott's go. Fjord, what are you doing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I use my 30 feet of movement to run that direction around the far side of the ruin? Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You come around the edge and you turn and see, right there in front of you, another one of these leopard-like creatures, and you're like, "Oh shit!" You didn't even notice there was a second one there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shit! I'll just fire both streams of Eldritch Blast from each hand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13 misses, unfortunately.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Second one. That'll hit. 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'll work.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Excellent. Nice. That's 11 points of Eldritch Blast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You blast and almost force it off of its feet for a second. It catches itself (growling).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice. Great, that's it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (hissing) All the snakes turn to look at you for a second. That finishes Fjord's go. Caleb, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I drop the hut, it's gone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It vanishes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Seeing what I see, I've got the transmuter stone, I can see in dim light, so I'm feeling into my satchel and I take out some molasses and smear it on my hands and cast Slow on-- I'll come as far as I can over here, behind Yasha, to see what I can see.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over here you mean?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will come this way, not getting closer to them. Yeah, that's fine. That's good. And cast Slow on the two creatures that I see.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: DC 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, all right, DC 16. That is a wisdom?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that is a success. 16 on the first roll. That's that one there. The other one, natural 17 plus two, they both succeed, I'm so sorry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, no apologies.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Good rolls.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Those were good rolls on their part. Does that finish your turn, Caleb?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If I have any movement left, I will back away from that shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have maybe five feet, I'll say right here. So you start backing away. Back at the top of the round. Beau, you're up. The orb has vanished, everyone has rushed out, you look over and you can hear these growls, and snarls, and impacts. Combat is happening. What are you doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my pillow-- ah! Then I just run and I say: Nott! Duck! I jump over Nott and I'm going for this one in the back, 45-speed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over this way, you mean?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, that one in the back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, the one that I've been shooting at or the closest--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The one that Fjord's been shooting at.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. First off, roll an acrobatics check to make it over the wall.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you're fine. (counting)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to come down, big Iron Man three-point landing, punch to its face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wow. Cool. Cool story, bro. 12?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12 misses, unfortunately.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I crack my knuckles on a rock and I'm like: Ah! And I roundhouse kick it with my second attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's better. That's a 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22 hits. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wow, that's super great. Five points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five points of damage with your second strike.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Then I'm going to go ahead and-- I hit it, so I can do stunning-- no, I need to hit it twice for stunning strike, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you just need to hit it once.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just once? Can I stun it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a natural one. So you miss the first strike, but as you roundhouse kick, you manage to kick right up in its abdomen. You feel ribs break and buckle under the impact of the kick. Some sort of chain reaction spirals across its nervous system as it falls to its side. It is stunned until the end of your next turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to spend another ki point and do flurry of blows for my bonus action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you can do that. Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And do pop pop, two more punches.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. You have advantage on these, I believe. Yep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: First attack. I'll take that natural 17, which I'm pretty sure hits for nine damage, and then second attack is a natural 20. Thank you, Gil. Roll two dice. That's double sixes! That's 12 plus four. No, wait. I double my die roll. I only roll once.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It would have been fine. It's the same either way. So 16 points of damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry, 16 points of damage plus four, so 20 points of damage. Wait. No, 16 points of damage. Math!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It doesn't break the skin, but you can feel you hurt some meaty organs in the inside. Does that finish your turn, Beau?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Caduceus.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So there's a stunned one behind me? A stunned one on one side of me and a not-stunned one on the other.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to hit the stunned one with the Vampiric Touch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. You have advantage on it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're at one hit point!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm at four.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's getting Vampiric Touch. That means he'll get to heal a little bit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It lasts. That's 17?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that hits. Roll damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So I get three back?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You heal three back.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So now I am at seven hit points. Now I'm going to vanish. I'm going to disappear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You turn invisible.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to turn invisible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Until the end of your next turn.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. I'm going to circle around and back off. Yeah. Then take a couple steps back. See if anything happens.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It hears you moving and swipes out. It has disadvantage on the strike. The snakes swing out towards you. That is a 14 to hit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That misses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You dodge out of the way. The snakes all snap out in the middle of the air.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That ends your go. It's now their turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're going to be fine, Jessie.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Totally.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're asleep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fails. Avantika falls asleep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is this a spray or a cloud?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a cloud.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So it goes around walls.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. I need you to make a constitution save, Nott.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Me too, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Was I in that? Or no?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're fine. Make it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You succeed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You succeed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How about Yasha? Did Yasha roll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yasha was just out of the range of it, actually. With that, it's going to attempt to run off this way and dart. Yasha gets one strike on it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She'll make it reckless.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Can't, reckless is on your turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's right. Yeah! That's a 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'll hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She's raging so 3d6. Nice! 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As she strikes wide with the blade, the creature (snarling). It's limping a little bit and it's trying to back away. It's unable to move from where it is. Its speed is reduced to zero. So it turns to now look at the two unconscious figures on the ground. That one is stunned so it can't do anything. Jester, you're up. You're asleep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I dream--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jamedi is going to move here next to the trees for cover. He's going to reload his shortbow and take a shot at that-- natural 20!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh! Get it, Jamedi!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That's eight damage with the shortbow.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Palms are sweaty.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Knees weak.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to end his turn. That brings us to Yasha.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That made me so happy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, "Mom's Jamedi" is pretty great.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She'll run up and take her two swipes, reckless.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She going to move?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes. There you go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Reckless, Great Weapon Master.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah! You know it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is she that? I don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's not Great Weapon Master, no.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a natural 20. Dope!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll 3d6 and then double that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's seven, 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 plus six, I believe. So 20 points of damage. Yeah. How does Yasha want to do this?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She'll see it sit there, and she'll reach up high, and she'll try and cleave off the front of the jaguar's head in one downward swing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The momentum carries it, but it runs straight into the base of the tree, crossing the way before (impact) on the ground. The head, still (growling). Coming to rest on the ground.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She still has one more attack, can she use the rest of her movement to move towards the jaguar? I think she has ten feet of her movement.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She could, yeah. If she has the rest of her movement, she can use it to move up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is that melee or just outside of it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's melee.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh great, reckless as well. 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah! 14 points of damage. Plus three, right? Or no?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The 3d6 only happens on the first attack. So it's only 2d6 for the second one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, thank you. Lets back it down to nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That finishes Yasha's go. Fjord and Nott, you guys are up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll climb up over the wall and take a shot at the one remaining leopard. A pew pew. 21!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21 hits! You have advantage on that shot because it is stunned.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Advantage! Well, that's a weird roll. I'm going to do that again. It's still like 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so sneak attack on them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. Ugh, terrible.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I spit on you with that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's okay. 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 points of damage to it, struck. The blow hits and sinks in. The creature's looking hurt, but it's still standing, though it is stunned.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Damn. All right, I'll reload and shoot again, this thing is--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With advantage because it's still stunned.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Great. 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 26 will do, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And then this is not a sneaky attacky, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. You only get once per round.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Much better. 11, and I'll use Fury of the Small to make it 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, it's looking really hurt. It's real hurt.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fjord gets it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Get it, Fjord.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, Fjord, what are you doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, you know, maybe don't kill it. We can interrogate it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because you guys are going at the same time, you can figure out, these are simultaneous.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll take just enough of a step back to use Eldritch Blast again and I'll fire both of them at it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two strikes on it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Eldritch Blast, 14?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 just hits. These are with advantage because it's stunned, don't forget.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shit. The first one was better. 14 as well on the second one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, both hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, great. (counting) 19 points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19 points of damage, how do you and Nott want to do this?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What did you use to attack?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What did you do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I shot it with the thing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll light it up with this crackling green Eldritch Blast energy coming from both of my palms, causing its fur to smoke and burn off and its snake heads to repel!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll shoot it in the nose.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Its torso erupts in green flame and energy, just (explosion). The body slinks to the ground in a smoldering cinder and as it's head (moaning), (arrow impact).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll look over at Nott.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys all take a moment. Make a perception check of the jungle around you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, who? All of us?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All of us. Six.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. Jester's asleep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Three.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Quick! Hey, hey, hey!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13, okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keep hitting me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey! Fjord! She needs some mouth-to-mouth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can use an action to wake her.

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester, you come to consciousness and you're half-curled on Avantika, who's half-curled on you since you guys passed out right next to each other.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb is going to quick-walk over to Avantika, kneel down and say, "Are you all right?!" with his back to Spaghetti and cast Identify on one of the swords.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Make a deception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. My back is to him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know. There's still motions involved.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "Are you okay?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It was almost a one, but it wasn't. That's pretty good. It's 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you bend down and focus on the blade-- which one, the dagger or the rapier?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The rapier.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The rapier is a plus one rapier. Nothing too crazy or special--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Aw, should have focused on the dagger.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pat the cheeks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. She comes to and pushes you away for a second and pulls the blade and puts her back up to the wall and has both blades out and is coming to consciousness, but instinctually is defensive.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to gather in and keep an eye out before I come back into visual-- I'm about to become visible again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did we win?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We won.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know that we did; there were only two of them, and because Caleb left the bubble, it disappeared, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know, are we safe where we are?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can do the bubble here and have this wall take up some of the bubble space, or we can be right next to this wall.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We made a bit of a ruckus, that's the last thing you want to do in a jungle.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are we what?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you okay?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Uh.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You don't look very good, Mr. Clay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you. I'm going to Cure Wounds.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: On yourself?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did they seem like intelligent beasts?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to do it to you, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From what brief encounter you had, it's hard to say. Make a nature check-- actually, no, this would not be a nature. This is not a natural creature. Make a general intelligence check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's better. That's a 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20? They don't appear to be. They're more intelligent than some creatures in nature, but there isn't any sort of--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Still animalistic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, still animalistic. They are natural to this island at the very least.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're animals, they will leave.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Agreed. We should rally up back-to-back while Caleb casts it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we going to leave the two dead animal bodies right here, next to where we're camping? Because that could stink.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll move over to where our bubble was before, how about that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll start them going too, so that wont be a thing for very long.

lines.name: TRAVIS, MARISHA
lines.text: Start them going.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will begin my ritual spell in the same spot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What were you guys doing out here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I was sleeping. Did you notice?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, but before that. Why did you come out here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will whisper to you: Why did you come out here in the first place? Why were you walking around in the dark, alone?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No need to yell, that's all right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm whispering!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We were just looking at the temple, trying to get an idea of what it was.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, he was holding his light up really bright and seeing if he could find any words and stuff. I think they might notice some light.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, that may have been a poor call.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's okay! We're learning things.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I definitely feel like I've learned-- I think I need to pass out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A good night of sleep will do you very well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does everything in this jungle have snake heads?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think that's a fair assumption.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or snake legs or snake arms or snake dicks.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Mecca lecca hi mecca hiney ho.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You complete your ritual spell and the Tiny Hut is completed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Into the bubble.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, Jamedi goes, "Actually, I will be, if possible, interested in staying within "this this time."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, all right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He grabs a few things from the tent-- and it's a very tight space. Nine creatures is the max, right? You've hit the maximum. You all manage to fit in there in a not terribly comfortable space.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ten-foot radius, so 20 from one side to the other.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I still think one of us should stay up in shifts inside this bubble. Just in case.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm very jittery tonight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll stay up with you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Even lands on Avantika's shoulder a little bit and does a little--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I bring Sprinkle out from inside my hood and make sure he was okay during that whole fight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sprinkle, who is not necessarily used to the type of weather, appears to be very uncomfortable in the heat and being tucked into the cloth and is like, (chittering).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I give him some water and some little food.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What are you doing to that poor dog?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm sorry, buddy. (kissing)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is the crimson weasel. The dog is with the Ruby of the Sea.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Eh, whatever.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Entschuldigung, I'm sorry. Now the owl is pitter-patting on Avantika's hat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just walking along the hat?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not constantly, but in a cute way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Make it poop on her hat.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you putting the umlaut over the o's in the poop? Pyoop?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What are you talking about?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You said "pyoop."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Avantika puts the finger up towards Frumpkin.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't do it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He flitters up to the finger.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Make it poop on her finger.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Unrealistic.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He does whatever I say. He bats his little one-ounce owl eyes at Avantika.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Interesting."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Have you never seen an owl before?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not one so small and adorable and is docile."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mm-hmm. It's pretty cute.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Frumpkin poops.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Really? Hey, Avantika. How many dudes you think you killed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What, in all of my years?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know. I stopped counting at around 50."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh. That's awesome.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a high number.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, that's a big number.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But in my line of work, it's important to not hesitate when some drunk asshole tries to, I "don't know, take your ship."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We can't relate at all, nope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, anyway. I will be taking a nap with one eye open. Good night, everyone." She settles into her camping garb. Who's keeping watch? All right. Make perception checks for the first watch, guys.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're inside the bubble, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But you can hear things.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One. Also, we're being very quiet because we don't want to be heard, but while we're in here, Frumpkin, over a period of ten or 15 minutes, you see this, goes (pitter-patting) along the ground and hops onto Avantika's boot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (pitter-pattering) Eventually stands on top of her dagger, and I cast Identify through touch of my familiar. And he weighs one ounce.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that's true.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: One ounce is good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One ounce owl. It's the best band.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The One Ounce Owl?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Avantika, who, as mentioned before, was sleeping with one eye open, essentially, is rested there and then right as you begin to go through the actions of casting, there is a flash of motion.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) Oh, no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What is Frumpkin's armor class?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, I'm sure it's terrible. Hold on a second.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Go to the creature tab on D&D Beyond.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am. It is 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Frumpkin suffers five points of piercing damage as Avantika instinctually (slashing, panting).

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Why did you do that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Why did you do that?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know why I did that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And you know why I did that."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ey.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Be glad it was just your owl. Please do not go peering where it is not wanted, eh?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Recycling Frumpkin.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I promised Beauregard an owl for a week, so I can't have my cat back. Ten minutes later, there's an owl. Watch is over.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Towards the tail end of it, you do see a shape of another one of those leopard-like creatures that stalks on the outskirts of the strange, opaque orb you've created and approaches it. (sniffing) Circles around it for a bit, prods at it every now and then. Spends about 40 minutes or so keeping a watch and then eventually loses interest and wanders off into the jungle.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cool.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (whispering) I like cats.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not that kind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, next watch? Who's taking next watch? We only need one more watch; I think. Jester?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: On the way-- because I got a pretty good amount of sleep during that fight-- can I ask Caleb, before he goes to sleep: Hey, Caleb!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Could we stick things through the bubble?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja, you can go out and in, and you can-- sorry. You can put your weapons through it, but no magic will go in or out. But you can leave and come back anytime you want.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, just checking.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But please don't go on any walkabouts while we are sleeping.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm not going to, Caleb.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But you already did.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, that was for Caduceus. Don't worry about it, okay?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you promise?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course I promise. I'm going to stay in here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is good enough for me. Good night.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good night.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (snoring)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: SAM, TRAVIS
lines.text: Jesus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, nice. He sits across the opposite way, and you're watching this way over his shoulder, and he's looking over yours and doesn't engage in conversation, unless you wish to.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have you ever seen those cat things before?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have seen them my first time passing through here, yes, but I was quieter."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we're pretty loud sometimes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You are correct. This has been a bit more challenging than I originally anticipated."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have you thought at all about the Traveler?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want a pamphlet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I am confused as to what you are speaking of."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) The Traveler.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You are strange."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's everywhere.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And creepy."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's really great. I'll give you a pamphlet. I get it out, and I walk it over to him. Here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It takes a solid ten seconds of him inspecting it and looking up at you before he--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just read it over. There's a lot of information in there. It's really important.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Much appreciated."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's here right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tucks it away into the inside of his vest.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Traveler! If you're here, you should show him you're here so that he will like you even more than he already does! Just give it a minute.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (farting noise) You're not quite sure who it was on that side that let one loose in their sleep, but the inside of the dome suddenly has a very fragrant air.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Dutch oven.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: To be fair, we all had Indian for dinner tonight, so it could be any one of us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He has cast his blessing upon us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Really, the most impressive of miracles."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How long have you been working for Captain Avantika?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Only for this journey and once before."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you like her a lot?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "She pays well. Does not judge."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What were you doing before you were working for her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Working for other people."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's the craziest thing you've ever done?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: His eyes narrow at you. "I was the only survivor to the escaping singular mines to the "north area of the continent. How far have you traveled outside of the Empire?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm from the Menagerie Coast, actually.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So that far.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have delved into a few ruins. I have been lucky enough to survive by working alone. I have "seen many friends fall and disappear, but I have made my way. What's the craziest thing you have seen?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ever? In my life?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Sure."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit, I've seen some crazy shit. This one time I saw a bug carrying a piece of bread that was like five times its size and he was carrying it up stairs. Like up and then he would turn and then it would go up and then he would turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm going to concentrate on our surroundings for the remainder of our shift if you "do not mind."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Me too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks out. Now towards the tail end of your shift as the sunlight begins to slowly peak--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is some more shifting in the nearby bushes and you see two figures beginning to approach the sphere.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) Oh shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Shh." He gets his short bow ready and nocks an arrow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) If they stab through--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Maybe. Just shh." As you guys wait you can see, similar to what you had previously seen in your travels on this island, two lizard men armored. One carrying a net that's slung over his shoulder, the other with a long spear both with shields off to the side. Not ready for aggression, but they both approach slowly towards the strange sphere and begin inspecting it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) I put my hand on Fjord's leg.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Upper thigh?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They both begin to walk around and inspect it, prod and poke it. Jamedi-- you can see he's just looking out very intensely, bow notched.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) I poke Beau.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They both circle around the back end of it, poke the dome a few more times. One of them picks up a rock and throws it at it. It skips off of the exterior of it and rests in a nearby bush. They both step forward one more time and smell it closely. They both turn around and begin to make their way in the opposite direction of where the dome is set, making their way further into the jungle clearing. One of them stops and looks back behind one more time at the dome and turns back and both of them vanish into the nearby brush.

All of you getting a bit more adjusted to the temperature and general atmosphere. Beau, you're feeling a little rough.

Pressing on, Jamedi leads you for about another hour and a half, two hours through the jungle before putting his hand up once more to stop you all. Oh we didn't make the stealth check actually. Because I said when come back, yes.

You can see the stone coloration is more of a sandstone, yellowish to a dull gray and white with different materials used to accent elements of the constructions. This doesn't match the ruins you previously slept in the night before. These appear to be fresher. You can see the verdant green jungle vines and roots begin to entwine and tangle near the base of some of them and where it's built looks like parts of the jungle have grown up around and helped camouflage elements of this small village. You can see elements of the exposed stone carry snake-head obelisks that appear to be softly carved from bits of a marble material or recovered stone in a similar way that most of the construction has been done.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys slightly press forward, Jamedi showing you a bit of a path off to the side. He glances towards the path where he was going and one thing that catches your attention is you've seen the men with the snake arms, you've seen the folk with the scaled skin patches. What you see now, towards this one stairway portion that now leads to what you previously didn't see below the tree line, but a massive stone structure beset by these stairs on each of its five sides. Envision like a semblance of an Aztec pyramid, but a five-side shape that levels off at the top and there are stairs on each of these five sides. At the base of the nearest one, you see less of a man and more of a giant snake, maybe twelve to fifteen feet long, coiled and muscular. But to a humanoid torso with two heavy log-like arms that rest at its sides. One resting on this large sheathed scimitar-like blade, its head curled up into this heavy, straight serpent snake-like mouth as its jaw kind of hangs open and its tongue (hissing noise). It's just keeping an eye and it slithers across the road, bowing from side to side as it looks across the tree line.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: At the base of the structure it's doing that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The base of the structure. You're seeing a variety of these snake people going about their lives. This one is just keeping a watch in that one element and Jamedi you can hear curse under his breath. "It was the path I took to the inside last time. We're going to have to improvise. Which "way do you want to go?"

lines.text: We're trying to get into the center of this, all of this?

lines.text: Avantika's like, "Of course, inside that big thing right there."

lines.text: "As far as I can remember it was fairly clear but it is also-- I had to ensure that there "was not many watching. They have these-- like right there." He points over the side and you can see along the stairs almost like a withered person. You see them, like a smaller human, hunched forward, their body a light green tint to itself, kind of this wrinkled, scaled body, its neck protruding and curved outward. It looks what a-- like the lizard folk you had seen earlier but with a longer neck and almost geriatric in the way they carry themselves forward, lumbering. Carrying a large spear and appears to be watching like a sentinel across the upper portion of this large stone structure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From what you can tell from this distance, it's hard to see but it looks to be more serpent and more snake-like.
