lines.text: Okay, so--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can you make a distraction far away from us?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If Caleb and I move together, you have your Message spell that you can send back and forth to Nott.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We all have to move together.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, that's what we're doing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well you guys aren't as stealthy without being within 30 feet of me--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh boy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe we do the live bait thing, I don't know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What, act like you're tied up?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we'll do it anyway.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's if they see us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll tie your hands in the front.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If they don't see us, it doesn't matter what they look like.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think that if anyone that looks like me or you shows up on this island, anyone who sees it is going to come asking questions immediately.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I agree.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if-- do any of the people we see walking around, do any of them wear cloaks?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's not a bad thought.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The weather here is warm enough to the point where there isn't the need to bundle. There's no need for hoods because the society here wants to make sure they can very quickly identify who's a part of their faction and who isn't. So yeah, there's no cloaks. You see what are like open robes, simple bits of cloth just to cover aspects of the body for protection from the sun or otherwise, but beyond that it's mostly just skin and scales.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But there are some people that look just like people?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are people that look mostly like people from a distance, but upon closer look, their skin in places that gets a greener hue in patches, their eyes are yellow. Very snake-like eyes. Sharper teeth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I will use my disguise kit and try to make it look like they've got scales on them. They will probably know the people in their own fucking village, though. Let's be honest.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are there several dozen people, or is it--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've seen a few dozen in the streets, so the society here, you can assume somewhere in the neighborhood of like one to three hundred people live in the city total.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's do that, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's a lot of people.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll use Mask of Many Faces to look like one of those fucks and let's try to paint some scales on the non-changeling folks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (makes blipping noises)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you're applying them to Yasha and Beau and Caleb?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And the clothes we've seen on these people are like what? They're purple robes you've mentioned?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Purple robes, simple cloth skirts. Most of the whole thing that's worn there is for general protection and adornment. You can see jewelry adorning some of them, but it's very simple and it's more for purpose than anything extravagant or presentational.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (groaning) I begin to put-- ugh-- my spell books into Fjord's bag.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Of Holding?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I can't have ornate book holsters and-- ugh. Trying to make myself look as simple as possible.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Disguise Self!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Avantika goes, "I'll be watching. Au revoir." And she kind of--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where are you going? Where are we meeting? At the temple? At the top?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I figure the top of that would be a very effective place to meet. Is that not correct? That is where you entered last time, non?" She turns to Jamedi, who's keeping low to the ground and goes, "That is indeed where I was. There is a room inside there I could not walk into. I could not find a way through. That is when I returned. So we'll meet there." Avantika goes "Au revoir." Waves her hand through the air, and marks a few symbols and you watch as she disappears.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I had that spell once.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are these guys painted green? Is that what we're doing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's what we're going to find out right now! You're proficient with your disguise kit, so it's proficiency bonus plus I'll say dexterity check to see how well you can apply these details to their bodies. Roll for each one of them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For Caleb?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: State fair, all the way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Make me look like Spiderman.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb has these green circles on his face in splotches. And you're like, "Great!" For Beau?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, that's way better. 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau, actually, pretty good job; the linework and shading you had done in these various patches on the inside of the brow line helps make her look a little more snakelike. You've sunken the jowls, you've done the scattered patches with the patchmarks.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You look pretty convincing. How do I look?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Polio?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Now that I'm seeing how good I did on Beau, I'm realizing how shitty Caleb is, but I'm not going to tell him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What do you mean-- what did you say?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yasha seems strangely excited. "Me next, me next."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, okay. Oh.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is that a one? Shit. God-- why did you roll out that big fucker?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was good before!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This one's from Sam!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you feel pretty confident about it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You look amazing. It's a really good color on you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yasha goes, "Okay. Let's do this."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just think like a lizard, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do you mean she looks bad? I think she looks really good, Caleb.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to take some flowers and just stick one in his hair for good luck.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is that better?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know. It's good luck, though!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I lean in, way in, to Nott's ear, and say: (whispering) Oh, by the way, Caduceus says that Jamedi is actually a dead thing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?! What?! No, but what? Shit! Why are we following him, then?!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I lean in and say, Are we whispering now? We whispering again?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, they're gone!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (whispering) I was telling Nott that Jamedi is a dead thing. Caduceus says Jamedi's dead.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (whispering) Keep it on the DL.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The dead-low?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why are we following him?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just because he's dead doesn't mean he's a bad guy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (whispering) Are you whispering too?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, of course I am!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (whispering) We don't have a choice!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What if he came here, was killed, and was sent to come get us to bring us back as feeding for whatever's down there?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (whispering) What if we let the pirate queen tie rocks to our feet and we're dead?! We have to do this! We can kill them later!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Agreed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Agreed."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ah! You're still here?! Shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, I hadn't left yet. I was curious to see your--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you know? Where are you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't see, the voice is coming from nowhere.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is Jamedi here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking around, you do not see Jamedi immediately in the vicinity.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is he on speakerphone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, this is Avantika.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Avantika! Did you know he was dead?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Specifically he was not telling you, because I knew you were going to panic.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you know he was a dead guy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I was not aware, but now I am very curious as to where you found this information and what "you think this means."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, it's what I get, I suppose, for trying to be sneaky about things.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice job. He's going to fucking leave again. Good job.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Whose side are you on?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've been doing my best not to be thrown by it. It seems like he's been standing up all right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He's done work for me before, and was successful."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's pretty cool.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Has he always been dead? Is this a recent thing? Where are you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Don't worry about it. But nevertheless, he has done his job so far. I assume we just keep a "close eye. If ever he decides to give any sign of turning on any of us, well, it's eight against one."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Indeed. I'll take out several feet of rope from the bag of holding and say: We should do this before he achieves the destination. Forward.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "See you on the other side." And you watch as the dust-- (puffing) the footprints.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is why I was trying to keep it on the down-low.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I knew that certain members of the party may get a little excited. I, myself, had a moment of panic. Had a moment of panic myself. I've been keeping it contained.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You feel okay now?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, there's a dead guy walking around with us. That's unsettling. That's unsettling to my very core, I've got to admit, but you know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, now we just have to go walk around snake people and not be seen, so that's fine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's an improvement, at the very least.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey, Fjord. Avantika can go invisible or peek into what we're saying. Can you do that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No. Well, kind of. Not really. No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How much have you heard?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, I can pop in and out, but--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We've seen you flit about.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, that one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But you can't hear what's on the other side when you're popping in and out, can you? Oh, yes you can! That's right, you can.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How many fingers am I holding up?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: None.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh. I forgot to-- I'm really distracted right now. I don't know why I bother.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should probably get pretty snaking on here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll put two in the front, two in the back, and put these three in the--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: In the middle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your Pass Without a Trace has probably faded at this point, with the travel you've made so you have to recast it to get the spell bonus.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You guys, we should probably do it again?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (singing) Pass pass pass pa-pass. I give Yasha the Blessing of the Trickster.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Good call.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone make a stealth check, please.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's all I'm going to say.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's going to be in a defensive stance for most of the fight.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She'll be fine. I'll pilot her.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I would say let's text her, but she's in another country, so she probably wouldn't get it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Stealth checks, guys.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pass Without a Trace.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, I get advantage. 30. No! 38.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Rogues, man, rogues!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What? Natural one?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's a lizard person; she'll be fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And for Yasha, if you want to roll twice?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 25. Natural 15.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: At least I look like a snake person.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are two more that are in the process of being stripped. There is one street that breaks through two of the ones closest to you. Do you wish to take that path? What do you wish to do to stealth in? Because part of the pathway here is out in the open, so you'd have to gauge your timing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Describe the two again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where you are now, towards the main stairway that leads at the top, you have about two streets or three sets of buildings to get through. The ones closest to you, there are two large buildings that are immediately towards your side. One side has nobody around it. The other one has one individual that is currently flaying the hanging corpses of the four lizardmen.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I vote for the one guy flaying the lizardmen.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Agreed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because he's distracted?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Mm-hmm. And it's one guy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The other one has no guys.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That never is no guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I follow your lead, captain.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's go that way. We'll go towards the flaying.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You make your way, exiting the jungle way, and are you going quickly and quietly so nobody notices or are you strolling through, using your stealth as a means of trying to keep any sort of--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Trying to blend in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Got you. Okay. All of you move forward. Are you dragging them behind by ropes?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, we're in the middle. We're Assassin's Creeding it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Got you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If there is a building to walk beside, I would prefer to have our shittily drawn and one very nice one closest to the building with us on the outside.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Uh-huh. Yeah, I'll be the barrier.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Mama elephants and then baby elephants.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Aww, yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys cluster and begin to shift as this herd of snakefolk making your way towards that direction.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh god, oh god, oh god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a cluster of lizardmen that are currently chained and are currently pushing on a heavy bar that is dragging a large piece of stone out of the jungle and towards the center of the city. They're bent into slave labor for these people. They are now pushing it forward. That catches you off guard for a minute, but you continue to focus and move forward. As you get closer, you can hear the slick sound of the flesh being pulled from the back of the lizardman's body-- (wet ripping)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Aww, yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Moving around the side, the figure finishes and throws it, and glances over and looks at your group. Starts looking somewhat curiously as you pass.

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: (hissing)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check, Jester.

lines.name: LAURA, TRAVIS
lines.text: Why?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because I rolled a shitty stealth, that's why. Oh no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yasha's going to make a deception check as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasp) Natural 20!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Yasha rolled pretty high on that, actually. The figure goes back to its work and begins carving it. You move past that into the first street walkway. It moves on for about fifteen or so feet and then it has a crosspath. It goes to the right and the left, and ahead it goes to another set of buildings behind, and there is an alley that turns to the right and it seems to end at that point. So you have a T intersection before you, and then it ends and curves to the right. Where do you go?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So an intersection to go through to get to the right turn past it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I see. So it's like a cross-T intersection?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. You keep moving and then there's a right and left, or you keep moving and then it turns to the right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are there any windows, doors, anything on these buildings?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see open squares. There's no glass panes, but there are carved rectangles removed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can we move up to the side of one and glance in as we slow down just a little bit to peek through?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: On this T intersection?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, before we get to the intersection.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just to be clear: I always thought that a T intersection was an intersection like this.

lines.name: MATT, TRAVIS, MARISHA
lines.text: Four-way stop.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's my fault. It's a lower-case t! Lower-case t.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, no, no, I get it. I just wanted to make sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry, I meant a cross intersection.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't you listen to her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's fine. It's an important clarification. That's my brain fart, man. I appreciate the backup. But yeah, you're right on that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, guru Liam. Yeah. Liam from Ojai.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Namaste.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to go listen to your tapes, your level seven tapes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A most expeditious movement towards the temple, I suppose, would be the--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we look in the window?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As he's saying this, you glance to the window to your left, and as you look in, make a perception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ugh, seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You glance inside, and it's a simple interior. There's a little bit of sunlight coming through from the opposite side of it from the direction of the light in the sky. It frames ambiently the outside of a figure that appears to be humanoid that is sitting over a table, and you can hear some grinding or carving sound, but its faced away from you. Looks to be some sort of workshop.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Keep going?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, we'll push through.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You push towards the first intersection.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I see the tower-- the temple at all, above the buildings?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you can see the top of the temple from here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, does this curve look like we're still heading the right way?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It'll start making towards the nearest stairway that leads towards the top.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's just the bottom of the structure that curves around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you approach the T-intersection, you hear this murmuring of conversation coming from the left-hand side of it. (whispering)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I cast Comprehend Languages.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do, and you pick it up. It is Abyssal.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Abyssal?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! No, Yasha can't--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yasha can speak that, no?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't know, if you had her character sheet, you would have the benefits of knowing that. But, not my responsibility. So you pick you on it and the muttering is akin to, "Come, we have "to pick up the hunts. The food stores are running dry this season." As that comes to you, you glance up to the side and you guys watch as two figures round the corner. They're both mostly human in body, though their bodies are scaled and a dull green-gray color. Their heads, fully serpentine, snake jaws-- the hood's not open, but retracted-- and they both have, strapped across their shoulders and torsos, longbows that are at rest, and they have quivers filled with arrows. They walk past and glance over at the rest of your crew. Make a deception check, Jester.

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: (hissing)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Big money. Okay, okay. 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yasha as well. The disguise didn't quite go well, and Yasha and Caleb-- even in the clustered section-- catches some attention. The first one keeps walking. The second one glances over and looks to the rest of you and, "Hey!" You hear in Abyssal, "Hey, what've you got?" You guys hear (Abyssal).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: As that one turns, I'll turn to Yasha and I'll go (hisses) and punch her in the face and say, "Go down!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She goes (grunting). She's not used to rolling with the punch.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're going to take a dive.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She goes down and the figure looks up, its eyes narrowing and the tongue (slurping).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Stand over Yasha, take the rope, and start tying her hands together.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Wait," to the other one, who stops, looks back and goes-- begins to walk towards you, keeping a hand on the bow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I cast Hold Person.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sorry, I already said it. At 3rd-level.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On both of them?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a failure; that's a 12. Oh, that's cocked. And a natural four. They both fail. They both freeze in place.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should tie them up and then go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're in the middle of the street. We can't tie them up. We've got to go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're in the middle of the street?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're in the middle of the street.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's go. Let's walk quickly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Run.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we're picking up and moving expeditiously away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I really should've charmed them instead of held them, but let's go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, or distraction.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Want to do a distraction now?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not now. We've got to go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Distraction is them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They are currently paralyzed in the middle of the street for the next minute. Once they're released, they're going to do whatever they do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we seen anyone else around besides those two?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right now? Make a perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Glancing about at this moment, the only other figure you can see near this intersection is one of the patrolling, hunched creatures you saw up on the temple itself on the second tier, and it's currently walking away from you and doesn't seem to be paying attention.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grab them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, actually, we should chase them and kill them because they could actually snap out of it at any second.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We should kill them?

lines.name: TRAVIS, LIAM
lines.text: Kill them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grab them; slit their throats.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They're large beings, right?

lines.name: SAM, LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: Pull them off the street.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, Yasha.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hold on. While you guys are deciding on this, every turn they get to make a save.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, that's right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Natural two and 11 plus two, 13. Yeah, they're still held.

lines.name: TRAVIS, LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: Pull them off the street.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You and Yasha should pull them off the street.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys lift their arms and pull them off.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Weekend at Bernie's.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are there any doors around here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The building to the left of you was the one that you saw the craftsman in. The one to the right, you can see there is an open doorway.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there anybody in there?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's just go in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you drag them over.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to walk forwards first to peek in because I look like a snake.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, make a perception check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. That's terrible, 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You glance inside. You can see what looks to be a pile of rags on a small table in the corner, but nobody else appears to be in there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Inside.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You guys pull them inside.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wrap them up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Another 11 plus two, 13, failure. An eight plus two; they're still--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, tie them up as much as we can and then gag their mouths. Toss them in a corner.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're working the rope.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Should we kill them?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja. They would kill us; we watched them skinning the inhabitants of this--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a five.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Will they wake up if we hurt them now?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck it. I summon the sword, I run over, and I shove it into his chest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's your DC?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One of them succeeds.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're already tying him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're in the process of it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He kills one guy. I snap the other guy's neck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The guys that's paralyzed, going ahead and attack.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I plunged the sword into his chest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Attack twice, each time with advantage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, with advantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both hits are crits because he is paralyzed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Amazing. That is a 16?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are they automatic crits?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, the damage is a crit. The second one is a 23. Yeah, 23 is the highest one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep, both hit, both crit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Both hit, both crit, okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You said one saved?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One saved.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But we were putting things into their mouths.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You were tying them up and (gasping) begins to-- but we'll get to that in just a minute.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You carve through him. These are more ranged hunters; they're not as hardy as some of the other ones out there, and this one, you manage to in just two quick swings, carve through the chest and take down most of the throat-- just tears open. It crumples to the ground, dead. The other, who is currently being bound, (snarling), begins to start making noise and getting ready to--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are we in a stone room?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're inside a stone room.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is there wood?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's not much in the way of wood. It's mostly stone in here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fire Bolt.

lines.name: TRAVIS, LAURA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fire Bolt or Fireball?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Bolt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wouldn't that still make noise?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It'll make a little bit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Great, so let's just fucking kill really stealthily really fast!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll an attack, everyone who's doing this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm shooting with a crossbow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, it is definitely flanked, so you get a sneak attack, but you don't have advantage on it because it is not fully bound.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 22 to hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Six damage; I'm going to stun him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Natural nine, fails.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 17 damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the Fire Bolt do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's 2d10, which is 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You watch as he (grunting) freezes up from the stun and then (gasping) takes a bolt to the throat. The eyes begin to roll back as a Fire Bolt blasts in its chest, and you watch as it burns the edges of its face up in cinders. It goes quiet before limping to the ground, the smoke coming up from its smoldering corpse.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Cover him up!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, the rags in the corner begin to shift as you watch what appears to be an individual sleeping in the corner begins to come to and it (raspy breathing)--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: God, go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Look up, and you can see what looks to be a more humanoid-- one of the most humanoid of the ones ones you've seen there, but with the scales-- what you managed to make yourself look like-- begins to come to consciousness and goes (snarling).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does he see us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you woke him the middle of his sleep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Charm Person!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jesus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is 15. it succeeds.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're supposed to be better at this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Somebody do fucking something, because he shook it off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (snarling)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Throat punch!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. The words you hear are, "Who are you? Help!" as the shout is beginning to come out, but you go ahead and--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Uh-huh, 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, 15, that hits.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Stun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a failure, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Uh-huh, he's stunned.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Stuns in the bed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (sigh) Sacred Flame.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. However, it did have the opportunity to shout out one phrase. We'll see if the guard heard it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh boy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know what'd be great right now? A distraction. Maybe fire?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a natural 15.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Set fire to the house?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's all stone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It is all stone? There's no wood? There's no nothing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There're stone tablets that have been carved and then placed up against each other. There's occasional scenes you can see through, and the ceiling above appears to be slats of stone that have been placed in a lattice formation.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I pull out all of the cherry bombs that I have and I go-- fucking fireworks!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But wait, maybe nobody heard.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's just get out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there any hole in the ceiling or anything? Is there a roof?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ceiling stone too?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The ceiling, looking up-- there is no second floor or anything, and it looks like it's just a continuation of stone. It looks like a series of thin slats have been placed one next to the other in a layering to create a ceiling.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Back door?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, this entrance is the only way in and out. There's a window--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to quickly grab two arrows from one of the dead lizards and stick them in his chest, and I'm going to walk out. I want to go-- yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was a suicide.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe they all fought each other.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys turn the corner, and as you exit, you can see that large, looming, slithering snake figure with the huge scimitar that's probably 15 foot from tip of tail to nose. Thick, burly body, slithering its way towards you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Like, can see us?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, what do you mean towards us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Meaning whatever noise, this figure managed-- I rolled high on its perception-- to pick up the sound of its call, and it's making its way in your direction.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. I will point down the street away from us and go (hissing) and cast Major Image, and I will summon the image of a manticore, a large manticore roaring and thrashing in the streets.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's tight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, full sound and everything? Because Major Image you can do the full spread--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The whole shebang-- make sound, it smells, the whole thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So now, suddenly, in the middle of this room, all of you turn and look and see as a full-grown manticore, akin to the one that you battled not that long ago beneath the mines near Alfield, you see wings unfurl (roaring). All of a sudden, all eyes in the city shift to this creature. In a matter of moments, you can see arrows being loosed in its direction, hitting the ground near it. The snake that was approaching you spins around, begins to draw its scimitar (snarl) and it begins to approach.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (shouting) Go!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: On us, or on the--?

lines.name: TRAVIS, MATT
lines.text: Manticore.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Great, let's run.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We run away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You put that behind where the serpent was?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, so he has to turn and move away from us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You guys arc in the completely opposite direction heading towards where the base of this temple is. There is another one of those that is currently at the bottom of the stairway that is making its way in your direction.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I point at the manticore.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You point at the manticore?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I can't. I point at the manticore. No, you did it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's the one who did it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey man, I look like a snake person!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is going to be great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The DC's low on these because you're disguised.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hey!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just had to beat a ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You had to beat a ten. You push, and it turns around and sees the manticore and looks at you curiously. It has to take a moment to decide which is more dangerous, the manticore or this curious serpent. Goes ahead and grabs you by the chest and begins dragging you with it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It makes a grab for her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. It can't choose, so it just grabs you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Blindness. I'm going to blind him before he grabs her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Well first, it has to try and grapple you, so go ahead if you want to fight it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, yeah, I'll try to back away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so acrobatics check. Natural two, so make an acrobatics or athletics check to try and break it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Cool. One.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it grabs you. However, what's the DC on the spell?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Constitution 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have to break that grapple; it's still holding you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What're you making?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jesus. Oh, nope. Do another.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was a very aggressive roll. Athletics or acrobatics?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep, your choice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Acrobatics.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ah, god!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: My dear lord! Fucking seven, but he still rolled a natural two, right, no?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's blind, but he's holding on to you. The scimitar's out and he's swinging it wildly at whatever's in the area now that it can't see and is (gnashing).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I take the sword and take a shot right at his wrist that's holding her? With the hand that's holding onto Jester?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. It's going to be at a major penalty.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So go ahead and roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17? Okay. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh boy, this is going terribly.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's going great, we're doing good. Oh, that's good! That's a 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. I'll say that'll give you advantage on your next check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It doesn't break the hold.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will step forward and say to the beast: How does the Lucidian Ocean say goodbye? It just waves. And I'll cast Tasha's Hideous Laughter on it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Falls to the ground and begins chuckling, though in the middle of this chaos it is now blinded and laughing. It releases you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The manticore is still roaring. Creatures are now flooding out of the city to combat this and you can see some of them are swinging and are beginning to notice something strange...

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, run away!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Run, run, run!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It doesn't seem to immediately notice your presence as you approach. If you guys are trying to stealth by without getting its attention, I need you all to make another stealth check now that you've engaged in combat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Add ten!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You'll need it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, hold on. Pass Without a Trace, is it concentration?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because you cast Hold Person since then.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, Hold Person is a-- you're right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Spell management!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sorry, I didn't realize Hold Person was a concentration.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's okay. It is. So straight stealth checks, guys.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep. 13.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Roll for Yasha. 20!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have Yasha's character sheet and she rolled a ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Hold on.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was super down the middle.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Every week we're like, this is the episode where we start thinking. This is the one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There we go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (singing and whistling) Something's out there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Natural 20 on his end.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Aww!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do you mean?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I rolled a natural 20 on my d20.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I know what you mean.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (arrows whizzing) (gnashing)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How far is this person?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About 15 feet above you, above the stairs, just in the middle of the open. Glancing off to the side, the manticore still drawing most of the attention, but people are starting to figure out the weirdness about it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I use my bonus action to Misty Step up behind them and I will kick them down the stairs towards the rest of us?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh.

lines.name: MARISHA, TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you can.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god, yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In a whisp of dark shadow energy you see Fjord just vanishes from sight and teleports right behind. Go ahead and make an athletics check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh god, those used to be really great for me. 17!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Natural four. You Sparta this fucker right off the side of the temple. You watch him tumbling down the entire length of the side of this temple before landing on the ground and skidding and looking unconscious and bleeding out of the side of his mouth at the base of the temple.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fire Bolt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: On the dead guy?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. Is he dead or is he unconscious?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's unconscious.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, yeah. That's a 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically, he's prone because he's on the ground, so it would be at disadvantage. Roll one more time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits, roll damage. So with the damage he took from the fall there. Oh, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, that's not me, jesus. I was looking at Yasha's and it was like, "When did I get Necrotic Shroud?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's five.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (exaggerated Arnold Schwarzenegger accent) Five points of damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's the sound it makes. Phoomph.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So he's burning and not moving. You assume.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's even more unconscious now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's get the fuck out of here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keep going.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there an entrance to this tower?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, you're going stairs up the side. It levels off towards the top of it, but you don't know what's at the top there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is there anyone following us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Many people.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Everybody.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Glancing around, I mean, the manticore's causing a huge ruckus in the middle of the city and those that have begun to realize that it's an illusion are looking around confusedly and at the moment do not see you, but that time is going to be very short because you're out in the middle of the sunlight. The trees aren't above you now. This is an open clearing in the middle of the jungle and you're just running up the side of these temple stairs with the light down upon you from the sky.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How tall is this person who's just died?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Maybe-- from foot to shoulder?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About four foot.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's only four feet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. It's like a tiny, hunched--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, I take out some iron and I go (whooshing) and he shrinks to an eighth of that and I pick him up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wait, the one you just shot?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I don't want to leave him here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's at the bottom of the temple.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, he went down there? I thought he was at our feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you guys have been climbing the temple and he kicked him down off the side of it. It's all good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would only do it if he was right where we were.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. No worries.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's just keep running.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. In! Out of light. Out of the way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone make one more stealth check now that you've had that brief encounter and teleported behind to make sure that nobody catches you before you reach the top portion.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Stealth you said?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Stealth, yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 12 for me. Natural 18 for Yasha.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get there for a second, take a few breaths and realize glancing over to the side that people are still emerging, looking over the side and you can see dozens of these snake people are emerging from the buildings and heading towards the sound of this raging manticore. There are those that are now scattering from the manticore, trying to engage them to tell them it's not what they think it is. There are eyes glancing around and you can see the sentinels are starting to-- But you guys are keeping low and out of sight. No one at the moment seems to notice where you are and the few that have noticed you you've either taken out or have lost sight of where you were traveling. So for the moment, you feel safe. At the top of the temple, you can see some sort of a worship terrace. There's torch-bearing statues of snakes sitting near the corners of each of these five sides of the temple, similar in shape to the one that you found, the idol. In fact, at the top of each of these torches, there's a similar golden idol, but while the one you have is smooth, each of these has a carved divot on the inside where the torch itself is actually burned in. Or where materials are placed in to burn as a torch when the night comes or for any ceremonial use it requires.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The top is open air?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right now, it's just an open platform. You do see in the center of it a heavy stone tablet about 12-foot by six-foot the rests directly in the center. You can see metal rings that are bolted in with metal rivets that hold it on the sides of the tablet. The stone itself appears to be stained with a variety of various shades of stain.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Like blood?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oak, mahogany, rosewood.

lines.name: TALIESIN, MATT
lines.text: So much stain.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where are we supposed to go?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we head towards the tablet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So wait, you said that there are tablets with rings on the corners of the tablet and splatter--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There was one stone table about 12-foot by six-foot and on the sides of it there are rings that are bolted in and there are stains across the surface.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Of the crimson variety?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, super sacrifice-y.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Obviously for killing. With all the reading I have done, can I ascertain or have a good guess of what this is used for besides?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you have a good idea.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I know it's for killing people, but does it do something? To do something. Summon things, make a god happy...

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does it look like a trap door to me?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have read many books.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, make an arcana check and make a religion check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I got a one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You're not entirely certain.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I got a 12.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not my neighborhood.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get the sense that this is for sacrifices, but you're not entirely certain to what ends and to what purpose, whether it's just ceremonial or for a specific purpose.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. And it doesn't look like it moves?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're still out in the open?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're out in the open on the top of this temple, but you do see, as you're inspecting the table and looking around, there is a trap door made of the same color stone that has a handle built on it that you can pull back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should I check for traps?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. Is it safe?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Investigation.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Though it is locked.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I'll unlock it. That's 28!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 28. Getting down to this device, you can see it's an intricate, thick, long key, what would have probably been that long and have a whole series of intricately designed cliffs to it to hit all of the various--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tumblers?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, you manage to get multiple angles and press and hold, and press and hold with all of your tools. It takes everything in your bag to get through it, but you manage to just hit each one properly and lift, and it pulls open with a grinding sound.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shut up, Nott! That was very good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That was not supposed to work!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was really good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That was luck. That was dumb luck.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Come on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do hear a smattering of hissing and growling sounds that are getting louder and louder.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Get inside of it. (mumbling) Can you re-lock the door or something?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Probably not, but I can try.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, we'll just shut it and hope they don't notice that we came up here. Let's go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You all dart inside. At this point, as you are stepping inside, you see on the opposite end, rushing up the edge, you see Jamedi go, "(huffing) Very good," and he jumps inside with the rest of you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where's Avantika?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have not seen her."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bullshit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I haven't!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you lying?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an insight check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll join this one, as well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: God fucking bull fucking shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hard to read.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Doesn't matter.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: "Hard to read." Whispers!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, how great was New York Comic Con?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Boy, sure was fun, Sam.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We met a lot of great Critters--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We did!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And thanks for everyone for coming out to the live show, and we'll be back again next year? I don't know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So I keel over mysteriously dead. Just kidding! Sorry. No, all right, cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. He darts inside, the rest of you guys are inside. You close it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, we close it, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm closing, slowly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The latch locks behind itself.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I locked it!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We may not have much time. Darkvision, what do we see?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Goggles.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're now standing in a small, five-foot by eight-foot chamber. You are all cramped in there, but there is a spiral staircase that leads down.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Time to go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One at a time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You first.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why me?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Check. For. Traps.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoever I'm standing next to, I grab their butt.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Who's rubbing my elbow? It's weird.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll take a big swig of liquor and start going down, scanning for traps.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Make an investigation check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Avantika! Avantika, are you here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, that's shit. I only rolled an 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. There is a faint noise you hear that goes, "Do not worry. I was waiting for you up "top this entire time."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm casting Mage Armor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Mage Armor is on. What'd you roll?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 11 for investigation.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seems safe.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Coast is clear! Let's go! (running)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which is precisely what you notice as Nott, your foot hits one of these steps that (clicks) gives out from underneath and the stairs suddenly shift into a sliding platform.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Weee!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How steep?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's about a 45-degree angle.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So how fast does the fall feel?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's only about ten feet, 15 feet down, and what would have stopped you to catch a moment, you all of a sudden (slipping).

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So it's not that far down?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not going to be a hard fall, but any sense of stealth you would've had, or any sort of surprise, is gone, as all of you manage to barely glide your way to the bottom or stumble on your ass, sliding to the bottom of this chamber. There in the darkened, lit interior chamber, three of these figures standing around this fountain, holding bowls, glance over their shoulders towards you and hiss with sharpened snake teeth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, good, this is the bowl drinking party! We were looking for it, oof.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The cobra hood, long and wide on each side. Its eyes glowing red from the back.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I begin casting Slow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (shrieks of disappointment)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, shit! The big black cobra hood, arms or just the serpentine body?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a slender humanoid body that's tall and thin, but its body is gray scaled and armor plates and then, from its shoulders, it extends up into the hooded cobra head.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Taller than the other three that were in the chamber?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's probably about seven-foot tall, and the others are about five-and-a-half, six-foot tall.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's skip and go to the next episode!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We got a week.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't we have that little box that appears that's just counting down from ten, nine, eight, and it's going to automatically skip to the fight right now, right? We can just hit it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We all got shit to do in the morning.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, yeah, that's so true.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, but cobra fight!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know. We'll pick it up there next week.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Tomorrow's a long day.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Good shit, Matt!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now, you guys are in the temple. We'll see where it goes from here. I'm excited.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's so Indiana Jones! This is so Nathan Drake!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I was like, where are we going to stick the rubies! Where do we stick their-- I don't know where to stick the rubies.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The rubies have a purpose, I know it!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Look at all these dice that fucked me tonight!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you, guys, for sticking around with us tonight. Have a good week, we love you, and is it Thursday yet? Good night! [music]
